# Stars of Cold Force (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]], [[Force Spells|force]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 8]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** See text

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Champions of Valor (WotC)Â­, pg. 59

This spell functions like *[[Stars of Spell Loss (Spell)|stars of spell loss]]**,* except as noted above and as follows. Each star deals 1d8 points of force damage and 1d8 points of cold damage to the target.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Name changed from *stars of Selune* to *stars of cold force* for campaign continuity.
